alert.note: Alert for Delta; Dickinson; Gogebic; Iron; Menominee; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 11 at 4:11AM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations in excess of 6 inches possible Friday into Saturday. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Upper and western Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact multiple morning and evening commutes starting Friday. Gusty winds coupled with heavy wet snow could bring down tree branches and cause potential power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heavier and wet snow will move in starting Friday morning. Snow will be heaviest and wettest Friday afternoon and Friday night. Lake effect snow will occur on Saturday with the snow becoming fluffier which will allow it to blow and drift around.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
